ReviewTitle: Satisfied customer. Highly recommend buying this entry level earphones.
ReviewBody: Satisfied customer. These are good entry level earphones. Not that costly as well. Its excellent on all fronts sound quality, ear-plugs are provided as well (extra that is). Mic is also included. Awesome sound quality. Couldn't have asked for more for this price.
Left ear piece stopped working. Got it replaced and still the same. Complete waste of money. Please look for something else.
this earphone is great except for you can purchase this quality in lesser price with other brands like jbl...but the mic is really fantastic and you get the volume rocker in the set...

ReviewTitle: You may or may not like it
ReviewBody: This is not as good a feeling of other stuff sennheiser makes. It's very thin in feel and the quality of sound is not satisfactory for me as I tried Bose, jbl, and soundpeaks. I recommend other earphones (not the head phones).

Sound is clear and better than any mobile headphones. Only thing I miss in this product is sound control. You have to do this with mobile or tab manually. It only have call pick and drop option. Best feature is sound quality is superb and awesome.

ReviewTitle: Clear Audio but not for bass lover
ReviewBody: Nice audio clearity balance sound but bass is bit low. Good durability not great and wire is long enough. Bass is even lower than CX 180 so if you are a bass lover buy CX 180 at lower price (rs 800) . Guys I'm not saying that cx 180 is better than this CX 275 has crystal clear sound quality.Mic 8/10Treble 9/10Base 7/10Noise isolation 7/10Overall I'll give 4 star there is no reason to give 5 star

ReviewTitle: absolutely love this pair of ear buds
ReviewBody: absolutely love this pair of ear buds. i needed something for my casual listening purpose while travelling, being on a budget these provided a great solution to that. at 1425 i couldn't have asked for a better deal. the best part is they are balanced, unlike most headphones on the market today that are just infused with meaningless bass. Don't get me wrong, these deliver amazing bass as well, but it's all controlled and the way it's supposed to be. amazing sound spectrum and clarity. anything for casual listening and beyond, go for it!
How to claim warranty for this product?

Decent earphones. Worth the price.1. Call cut button works just fine2. The same button, double tap to move to next track while listening to songs.3. Triple tap to move back to the previous track doesn't work. This worked with my Sony stock earphones.4. Sound quality is good.Although these features don't work when u use the extension that comes along with this. I'm not sure why the extension is required.If you are looking for a decent set of earphones this one is the right one for you. If u are an ardent listener and a music fanatic there may be other better options out there for you.

ReviewTitle: Simply one of the best of this range
ReviewBody: Well, I have used a lot many earphones over the years starting from Philips, Sony to Skullcandy etc etc of multiple ranges, be it below 500 or above 1500. But this particular product from Sennheiser has just upped my listening to music experience by miles. Simply one of the best of this range, and as an overall product also beats Sony and Skullcandy at its range. The music, the beats, the overall everything associated with a particular song feels even more vibrant now. I would suggest everyone and anyone looking forward to a decent earphone....go for this one. Absolutely worth it.

The sound quality is not excellent but good i would say, i opted it because of it's mic. I think its sound quality equals to the samsung's original note 2 headphones. Not good for bass lovers, i am not bass lover so i am OK with it. Build quality is not that great as compare it to its price tag, very fragile item. I guess cx180 might suffice my requirement which is Rs.500 cheap than this.

ReviewTitle: Best in this price range... For sound quality
ReviewBody: Built quality is pretty poor... But sound quality is best in this range... Not for bass lovers... It has v shape sound signature so it will have pure sound... I used it for 2 years... & Again after a long search for a upgrade I cannot find the better earphone so bought these...

ReviewTitle: upgraded from CX213 and I'm loving it. Grea sound ...
ReviewBody: upgraded from CX213 and I'm loving it. Grea sound quality even at high volume and the inbuilt mic is icing on the cake. If you want to upgrade from CX213, go for it.

Let me be very honest, I ordered the product on Saturday night around 8:15 PM or so and received next day by 2:30 PM. The earphones are mind-blowingly amazing, far better than many headsets available at 2k-4k. Sennheiser did an amazing job with each and every bit of the headsets. The ear cushions are very soft therefore you can wear those for many hours, coming to the sound quality the bass output is top notch. I recommend without giving a second thought go and buy it now!!!

ReviewTitle: Review from a Musician. Oneplus One + sennheiser CX 275s = Life.
ReviewBody: If you're a Bass freak like me then you'll definitely love this. I'm using it with my oneplus one and definitely having a great time listening to GnR, Metallica, AC-DC, John Mayor, Keith Urban, Fossils, The Missing Link, Fakira etc. (not a Bollywood fan at all). Noise cancellation is very good. Anyways, the build is fragile though. It looks awesome. The leather pouch comes along is a life  saver. It takes calls and does it efficiently. Much better than many expensive butt caps available in the market today. Recommended to everyone. Thank me later.

ReviewTitle: Best earphone in this price range.
ReviewBody: *Advantages:--Better sound quality-Ear fit design-Stylish*Disadvantages:--Feels like cheap quality wire (but it actually is good)-The mic was loose and was not fit inside the socket.-Mic quality is not very good.

These earphones are literally the BEST! I've tried Skull candy , JBL etc earphones but this is best among all . You can blindly go for it. This is the first time I bought Sennheiser and it didn't disappoint me. The Clarity is Soo good, even the BASS is Awesome you can set your equalizer too to enjoy more bass if youre a bass lover (like me) . Overall it's a GOOD DEAL.

5* for the product,5* for the quality,5* for the best delivery, i got my product in 2 days time,well that's awesome.About headset,it's terrific one i ever bought. I regret buying low class headsets.Great bass,good at noise reduction,detailed audio experience.Finally worth the money i spend and hope it lasts long.

Sound quality is awesome....Durability is good....But one thing....one  "L"  shape extension cable is provided which doesn't work....I have purchased this earphone 2nd time but still it has same problem....Just be carefully for its jack....These earphones are really awesome....

Sound quality is just brilliant, you can't ask for more crisp and clear sound in earphones under â‚¹2-3k, you can use them for a long time but the wire is somewhat fragile as it seems thought touchwood anything bad hasn't happened with my earphones so far

Excellent Pairs for Music with great clarity and adequate bass response. Not for Bass heads. Wire quality is not durable to wear and tear for every day heavy use on long term.Wire tangle easily if not kept organized.

ReviewTitle: Not best I have jbl t150 a before this and they ...
ReviewBody: Not bestI have jbl t150 a before this and they are Lil better than this. I have Xperia device on which I have tried Sony xb 55ap, jbl 150 and cx 275s. Xb55 ap have good bass and music quality is very good upto 80 percent of volume. Sony is better than jbl and cx275s. Driver size really matters but it is bulky and starts hurting if used for too long

Best of the best sound quality but slightly dissapointed with the material quality but overall a great deal....  if you wanna hear the every beat of music then blindly go for it... far better than JBL, Sony, Skullcandy, Boat, etc,. "Sennheiser" Name is enough!!!!
Awesome sound quality. You can feel the audio crystal clear with amazing effects and I love it. It's much better than Jbl T series. Control & mic works good.
Within this price range the best sound output it produces and of course the build quality is not that much good as it can be broken with a minimal rough usage, which is already happened in my case.

Really speaking for 5 years, I have used Skullcandy, Soundmagic, JBL, Motorola & Philips from the range of 700-2500 but I guarantee this one is the best among all of them under that range. Don't think anything else & just go for it. Super Noise cancellation with extra bass.

ReviewTitle: Value for money and timely delivery from Amazon - Sennheiser CX275 s Universal Mobile Headset (Black)
ReviewBody: Love the clarity of the Headset. If equalizers are adjusted it will give a dynamic sound and will not miss the crystal sound of the set.It blocks the out side sounds and use carefully while driving (especially riding a bike).Value for money and timely delivery from Amazon.

Excess base ,,equiliser don't effect much at full volume due to heavy bass.i hade jbl and Sony before this and even one senhiser also of low cost but pretty good sound.this one is also good, but not at all up to the mark.
Worst ever earphones canâ€™t hear songs with high sound and canâ€™t talk on phone using them ears will be damaged worst bass quality recommend not to buy

Good product but it gives better sound quality on vivo phones than my one plus 6. I have uswd sony befire but in aony basswas too much and become annoying after some usage. But this earphone is balanced and low voices areeasilu audible which were not on sony.

Nice sound quality and the mike is handy for long calls. Noise cancellation is good because of which you can listen to music at lower volume even in a crowded train or bus. This prevents hearing damage.

ReviewTitle: Amazon duplicate earfone sell kr raha he so dont buy on Amazon..
ReviewBody: Amazon gives me a duplicate earphones.My Sennheiser earfone which bought from shops still working..But the amazon Sennheiser earfone after 2  months the right side of earfone stop working ...Sennheiser ka pahele wala earfone 3 sal se chal raha he jo shop se liya tha ..Amazon 420 kr raha hai...

Yeah ! It has high quality sound . But the price is little bit high . I like sennheiser that's why i bought this for 1400 While you can go for one more piston for same quality sound and a affordable price of nearly 1k . Even if you buy this , It will be a good experience .

The product is having pretty good sound quality, it comes with a connector for adjusting to some phones, in my case I had to use that connector to Nokia 206 for the proper connection. Otherwise it fits in the 3.5mm jack. Good quality, along with mic.

First of all thanks to safe transport but the time took for delivery is little bit disappointed me,but its Okay.The product comes with 2 set of ear buds,one for vocal clarity and other for bass effect.Am totally satisfied with its performance with this price range also the mic was awesome,the clarity of the mic is appreciable.The only -ve i saw,it has no volume control.otherwise its 100% value for money.

Awesome Product. I use it with my Lenovo K3 Note and it works like beauty. No missing beats. Good Bass and the balance between treble and bass is just awesome.Update after 10 months: these are still working awesome without any problem. The bass is awesome for any type of song. Calling quality is great as well. A must buy
I've been using these earphones for 1 year now. Awesome quality. I didn't face any problem with it. If you like Balanced bass with clear sound just go for it

These earphones may be best in their price segment.These earphones may not be appealing to you into the first time....as it happened with me...but after some after a day or two they feel real awesome...Great BassGreat Sound ClarityYou may fail the authenticity test....as I did..though....my were original...so don't panic... Send them a mail with the required info they ask you...and you will get it authenticated.
I have 3 different earphones of Sennheiser, CX180 Street II, CX275 & Now CX2.00G,Sennheiser has excellent build quality and of course no doubt about its sound, it has balanced bass with clear treble.

ReviewTitle: One of the best earbuds for this price
ReviewBody: One of the best earbuds for this price!! The clarity is amazing, the bass is good. What more can you ask for! The only negative I feel is that the wires could have been a little thicker and sturdier..not that it will snap just like that..but still!! An excellent buy!!

I have been using this product for a year now. This is one of the best earphones I have used. Sould quality is very good. If not handled properly, the wires can get entangled. The material quality looks good and the product looks durable

Wanted a nice earphone with mic. After searching for days , finally decided to buy this.As, till now its been only 2 weeks and experiecne is fine. Cost with mic is a bit high , more than double , as without mic price was 700 approx.Overall sound quality : awesome ( i previously had samsung earphone and sennisser headphone, hence comparing it form my previous earphone)

ReviewTitle: Go for it ,if you'll be not using it roughly
ReviewBody: I own this one & sony xb55ap.Sound quality & base are excellent.Plus point over xb55ap is it's comfortable fit.very lightweight & you can use it for longer time without any problem.Build quality can be improved.Go for it, if you are not a rough user

The Sennheiser CX 275 S has a straightforward design. The rubber buds are soft and comfy to wear. It has noise cancellation feature which is pretty good and a minimal design. It has a good bass and treble range. Overall sound clarity is above average and it is tailored for a bass heavy experience. If you require a fair clarity and awesome bass featured headpiece, definitely go for it.

Really good earbuds. What i like more about these is the directional separation of different sounds which is really good for immersion. And bass is okay too.. And these get really loud. At the maximum sound there is apparent distortion but trust me you aren't going to get volume that high since is really loud..

ReviewTitle: Jbl etc But this is the best I personally feel coz if someone a bass lover ...
ReviewBody: I have used a lot of ear pods beats, Sony , Jbl etcBut this is the best I personally feel coz if someone a bass lover and clarity this one's the ultimate. Its tiny but when you push em in ur ears it blocks outside world and then it begins. The microphone is also very clear.Con: The microphone dsnt have a noise cancellation

ReviewTitle: The headset Quality is good. Amazon delivery is also good
ReviewBody: The headset Quality is good. Amazon delivery is also good. Rating wise 3star for headset and +1 star for fast delivery. Sound quality is good but not a worth for 1791/- Rs .. People if u need a headset just to hear music , then you can go for Senheiser street ll.. Both are having the almost 95% same sound quality. But if u need a headset with mic then u can go for this option .. Rest is all fine with this headset!!! Hope this review help someone

ReviewTitle: What senheiser claims it is unavailable to deliver
ReviewBody: Within 2 week the right earphone stopped working. Absolutely unhappy. Now I have been asked to reach senheisers toll free to claim warranty. Once the product delivered and such issues happen after turn time Amazon will deal like this with you and you keep wandering with these other vendors.

I have been using this headset for the past 1 year and I should definitely say that the audio quality is very good. The only minus in this product is that its wires are so delicate. You have to handle this headset very carefully. This headset is not suitable for rough usage.

Sound quality is as expected. But every time the earphone is plugged in, my phone starts acting crazy. The Google Assistant is activated, volume increases automatically, it's really annoying!! After doing some research, I found that the issue is with the cord pin. Disappointed with the product

ReviewTitle: The Best earphones in the house
ReviewBody: You won't find any other. It's the best earphones you could get in this amount.I am giving the review for this product after 6 monthsGood quality Good sound Great for music lovers.

ReviewTitle: and am most disappointed about this product failure in just a few months
ReviewBody: Started sputtering and giving strange ticking noises. I use these exclusively for work, and am most disappointed about this product failure in just a few months.

ReviewTitle: ... search i finally ordered this product which was simply amazing. i loved it a lot and will surely ...
ReviewBody: After a lot of search i finally ordered this product which was simply amazing. i loved it a lot and will surely recommend it to anybody who wants hear a good quality of music.

Now hating Sennheiser for lowering the quality of this model. ANow Sennheiser Cx275s is equivalent to the Sennheiser Cx180 that doesn't comes with a mic. And they are charging 800 bucks more for just a mic. Actually i was Cx275s user and the sound quality was very very good before but now its lowered down.

This is the third time I'm buying this same earphones, I so love the brand. Anyday better than Sony. The best earphones for sound clarity, bass and treble. Long lasting. Definitely buy this guys you so won't regret it , it's perfect in all sense. Good for the ear too, perfect size and weight.

As I was reading everyone review and it is as expected and even better. After reading all review I thought bass will not that great but I feel bass is also enough so I feel I got the great product and I am very happy with this.

ReviewTitle: best buy for long time music listener
ReviewBody: I got original product, verified by QR code.Its worth for 5 star bt i gave it 4.Good earphone if bought under 1.4kSound quality is very goodStereotype functioning goodBass is good than cx180 but not good then jbl t200ANoise isolation is superbCons :Low hissing sound appears in no music time due to noise cancellation system.Design of ear phone produce air contact noiseWhen contac in air flow during running or walking

ReviewTitle: the left speaker gone bad, i tried to reach the amazon
ReviewBody: i used for 6 months , but , the left speaker gone bad, i tried to reach the amazon , guys, their , services are superb ,they replaced me with a new one , but used for another 2 months , the same problem happened , again.The problem is the speaker which attached to the mic will be having high probability of going bad effect , and even lower sound ,, soI bought the Sennheiser CX 180 Street II, it works awesome...
The headphone is good while it lasts. In my case, one side the headphone no longer works , just 4 months after purchase. Not sure if there is a warranty and how to invoke it.

Got cx 275s instead of cx 180 because cx 275s has microphone!But the microphone itself stopped working after 2 months.Video/song pauses and starts by itself when the wire is disturbed even slightly.Song quality is super tho.Expected more from thin wire, my fault? Not.

ReviewTitle: Good Sound Quality but too much care needed
ReviewBody: The sound quality is amazing however you will feel pretty less bass. The wires are too thin just like thread and have to be handled with a lot of care. In this price it's not worth the money. In this the sound quality comes with extra care.

ReviewTitle: Great design and well planned product
ReviewBody: This is the best product for music lovers !! and I use it for laptop for vedio calling. it works great !!Angular adapter is very much useful to have the wire safe from breaking in log run while connecting headset with laptop.pouch is very helpful in keep the headset safe from breaking while carrying in laptop bag.All together it is well planned considering the minute details and giving the sound quality the best !! great product all together..GirishBangalore

great product at such an amazing price... now you can talk as well as listen to your favorite music on the go... without any hassles.. sound clarity is impeccable... you would venture into a different world of music after wearing this headphone.... do buy it if you're a music buff

I love this brand. I'm hooked to it. Great sound quality, no matter what kind of music you like. I tried Rock, Jazz, Old Hindi movie songs, Ghazal and even watched movie. Great experience always. Recommend it.

ReviewTitle: ... months now and I must say it is really good or perhaps Gr8
ReviewBody: I've been using this for more than 6 months now and I must say it is really good or perhaps Gr8.Noise Cancellation â€“ 4/5Comfort â€“ 5/5Quality â€“ 4.5/5Bass â€“ 3/5Treble â€“ 4.5/5Overall all I'd say this product is 100% worth your bucks except if your are a very heavy bass lover like crazy bass, Normal bass like Linkin Park, Dj Snake and everythin are good.

I've been searching for a good earphone when I make calls. Esp international Internet calls. I always get told that the microphone was not good. So finally I came across this. And it's been working great so far.

I bought this device Sept 2018, after using 6 months both the headphone speakers stopped working, now not able to hear anything clearly.Request you to help me how to reach Sennheiser customer care for replacement / repair, this device is still under warranty. So please help.

ReviewTitle: Very Good ear phones with Microphone.
ReviewBody: Purchased from cloud tail.(authorised seller for sennheiser in amazon).Very Very fast delivery.One of the best ear phones with mic. if microphone is not required then should definitely consider other options such as  CX 180 produces the same sound quality with some less Bass and sony mdr-xb30EX with heavy Bass.Pros  Very good sound quality.  Micro phone  Bass is very good (Thumps after 10 - 15 hr usage)  2 years warranty (no brand dare to give it.)  Leather Case.Cons  Build quality is low no tangle free cable.  Price must be little bit less (very high more than twice that of CX 180 which has better build quality)

ReviewTitle: Up to 4000/- no one can beat it's sound quality .
ReviewBody: Sound quality amazing. I listened sounds boat , Sony, scullcandy , JBL, prices about 4000/- , it's sound quality  equal to these brands. Clarity is amazing. Even I bought 1more triple driver . Cx275s sounds quality is better than 1more. Reviewing after 6 months.
Kinda regret buying it. The sound quality is just normal. Tangles a lot. ive switched to AirPods so i hardly use them now.

I received the earphones within a day thanks to amazing Amazon delivery. I have used the headphones for 2-3 days and I am very impressed by its sound. Sennheiser never disappoints when it comes to sound, I have another model MX-170 and I have been using it for last 5 years and it still gives that good sound as ever. This has got a more than average bass to it, and the sound clarity and all sounds which are overpowered by bass can be heard. Mic also a big advantage, and its fits into the ear perfectly , no chance of falling out. There are multiple options depending upon ear size. The only bad thing is that it gets tangled very easily, and becomes a hassle to untangle.

I just received these bad boys today let me tell u this by far these r the best pair I ever had I have used jbl Sony skull candy creative sound magic audio technicia but these headphones r where I stop its just going to be these here on.Crystal clear sound n those u love a good bass effect than man there r ur thingI ordered them yesterday n I received them today by far the best in the price range just close ur eyes n go for it ðŸ‘

ReviewTitle: Good but quality needs to be improved
ReviewBody: This is my 2nd Sennheiser ear phone.. the best ear phone ever. But it has very thin cable and it gets damaged after using 1 year.. Sennheiser should focus on the quality
Sound quality is great. No outside noise. You will be in virtual world. But wire quality is poor. Unfortunately it does not support Redmi note 6 pro.
Sound quality is good.....not extra ordinary.Almost noise canellation.Wire length is good.Light weight.Price is to high.Good thing is that two years warranty.

Completely loving this guys!!!. The balance between base and sound clarity is just awesome . U can listen vocals as well as suits for bass heads . Sennheiser never disappoints âœŒï¸âœŒï¸. I have tried both sound magic and Sony MDR xb50 ap but overall Sennheiser is the best .
The earphones are great they have a good sound quality. But the connector that comes with it was not functional... when i use the earphones with the connector, the sound disrupts.
Best earphones under this budget .Good build quality .Powerful bass.Comes with a leather pouch to carry it in .

The headset is awesome and when it's worn, you are isolated from the world.Only limitation is that the wires are not having any protection but I have been using it about a month rough it's able to withstand.The 3.5 mm jack seems to be wearing out the gold plating earlier than expected, I have to adjust the plug to get sound in both ear pieces other one works for all the time unadjusted.

ReviewTitle: Product is really good. Sound is great and best in this range ...
ReviewBody: Product is really good. Sound is great and best in this range but build quality is not so great very thin wires(I fear that it may easily twisted and breakable), but good bag is included to carry it for you so no PROBLEM.
Best product at this price. I was initially reluctant as many people has posted poor bass to be one of the drawbacks. Thankfully I found the bass perfect for music.

Sennheiser is the best.. previously I have used a CX180 that was good but a little low on bass n without microfone.. But this CX275 fulfilled all d criteria for d best earphone in dis range.. better build quality.. decent sound quality n bass n awesome clarity.. Loved itâ™¥ï¸

I have recently purchased these earphones after doing lots of research. And after using it for 1 week I can only say that they sound fine, not great. And if you talk to someone via mic, then you need to hold the mic close to your mouth which is not suitable for long calls.
Good quality but 1 side stops working after sometime. 2 year warranty with replacement is good.

ReviewTitle: Sound quality is good enough and ears doesnt pain after prolonged use
ReviewBody: Sound quality is good enough and ears doesnt pain after prolonged use .Previously i used Skullcandy smoking buds which used to create pain after two hours of use. Although the noise cancellation for Smoking buds was better then this one. Comes with an awesome small carrying pouch .
Beautiful product which fulfills your soul and body with music, detaching you completely from any damn distraction and disturbances, either in train, in railway station, anywhere.

Simply a value for money.Sound quality is excellent in this price range. Balanced sound... Doesn't feel like lowering of vocal during bass... Simply awesome... A must buy in 1700 price. Recommended for anyone who wants balnced sound nd bass is not that high as in sony in-ear earphones but it is a earphone for all the daily users. Wire quality looks a little bit fragile nd weak bt its not. Noise cancelling is awesome.. Blocks almost all sound from outside.
This bass driven earphone from Sennheiser may not be for everyone. But if you are looking for a lightweight earphone which has remote and mic as well as sounds decent, this is the one to buy

Hands down to this brand. This is one hell of a earphones I'll ever own. Starting from the package to the material quality to the sound quality nothing could have been more perfect than this. Every penny was worth it! Thankyou so much Sennheiser for producing such quality products and setting a benchmark!

ReviewTitle: A good earphone at quite reasonable price.
ReviewBody: it's really good. But jbl t150 a gives almost same quality at considerably lower price (this one is slightly better though). So if u are looking for value for money go for jbl t150a (available at 899 when I ordered this ) or else this is fabulous.. Specially the ear buds are super comfortable (much more comfortable than jbl ones). The wire is a little thin but sturdy. The material looks a bit sticky. Better keep it carefully if you don't plan  use  it for a long time. (one of my older Nokia headset suffered from that. Got tangled and rubber melted and ultimately unusable).But in short if you are looking for a good earphone with mic in mid range budget this is a solid option.
Microphone does not works. Can hear callers voice but peer caller does not hear our voice. So it's only for music listening

Sennheiser only word is enough for about quality if you got original oneI m using it from last 6 years u ll never be disappointed with this productOnly the thing is it was delivered late as i already mentioned my office time and they deliver me 2 hour late

Sound is awesome.Wire management is little bit hectic because of its rubber coat.Not volume up down button. but You can find this feature in other products with in this range.Leather bag quality is really good.
How do I get it replaced? It's been 3-4 months and my earphones are damaged. Even without any physical damage to the earphones, the sound in on eear piece is almost gone. Please help me out.

I'm writing this review after 3 months of purchase.Sound quality is awesome. Ear buds hold the position very well. Length of the cable is very convenient. The pouch and the box look trendy and the extra pairs of ear buds provide extra fitting options. But one less star for the cable which needs to be handled with utmost care to avoid tear.

ReviewTitle: Best Earphones with 2yr Warranty - Go For It

And if you really want to test these earphones listen below song.The Weeknd - The Hills @ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yzTuBuRdAyA - Feel the real bass......

ReviewTitle: Satisfactory and recommended for good sound quality, noise cancellation, comfort.
ReviewBody: Sound is better at this range compared to other brands. But the rubber at base of head phone, jack are started tearing

ReviewTitle: Really good product for the price.
ReviewBody: Really good product for the price. The bass is not that great though. I use it at office with vnet phone along with Uni4 RJ9 To Single 3.5mm.

ReviewTitle: Great support from Amazon and cloudtail
ReviewBody: Excellent earphone which I have received today as an immediate replacement for the faulty one sent  by cloud tail two days ago, love the  great bass and nice clear sound enjoying the new one thanks amazing amazon atlast satisfied with my budget earphoneâ˜ºï¸â˜ºï¸

Expected more for this price. But there is no bass effect, sound is crispy and loud. That's it.Product is genuine, but didn't provide bass effect. I have recently used Philips 600 rupees headset which is having more bass than this.But noise cancellation is top class. When listening can't even hear other people talk!!

ReviewTitle: Sound Clarity is really very good. Noise cancellation is good but not the 100% ...
ReviewBody: It was a really worth Headset which im using for my One plus One phone. Its worth every penny which you pay, sound clarity is really very good. Noise cancellation is good but not the 100% noise cancellation. When im in skype call, i do hear every other noise as well apart from the person voice!!! But really good product. Im loving it.. Hearing the Music in this head phone is really a very good experience. And more over 2 years warranty i bet no one would provide for this cost.And if anything ever happens to your ear phone there will be replacement with the entire new one from the company itself(as 2 years Warranty period), which till now i haven't seen from any other company would do.

Everything mentioned in the product description is perfectly true -- what do you want more? One thing I should mention is wire is thin with a Capital T, but it has two year of warranty so you don't need to worry thinking that "I might break the wire" and something like that.....

In present if consumer buying high cost product then they need the durability and flexible quality in all condition. The said earphones wires quality is bad, very thin & very sensitive... Despite the good quality sound we cannot use it freely.

ReviewTitle: Good sound quality. Bad build quality
ReviewBody: The audio is pretty good. Bass is average. But the built quality is really bad. After 6 months the insulation is worn out. I'm not a hard core user. The product is just bad.

Bass lovers would love this. It has a good sound quality or I say best at its range. You cannot compare this with bose or beats, but this is far better than JBL, Sony, apple earphones (compared to this price band)

If anyone want clarity and balanced sound output go for it. Sennheiser signature sound. Love it. Mic quality is average. Material is OK type, wires do tangle a lot. If u just want bass, search for other earphones.

ReviewTitle: Thumping bass and awesome sound clarity
ReviewBody: Good Bass and awesome noise cancellation. But the wires not tangle-free.Sound clarity is very good. Produces high quality sound even at the high volumes.Initially I thought Senheiser will not produce good bass. But these earphones are out of the ordinary.It has a perfect balance between bass and the chores. Bass is not killing other sounds.The mic also works well with my OnePlus One.... Go for it.Value for money product!!!!!

ReviewTitle: Best sound quaility and mic input
ReviewBody: Best earphones in this range. ReviewTitle: Serious bass response with a light, secure design
ReviewBody: The Sennheiser CX 275s is an earphone pair geared towards the bass lover on a modest budget. At Rs. 1690, it's neither cheap nor over-priced, and offers solid, distortion-free audio performance. The boosted lows will scare away purists, and even bass fiends might find the highs, which are boosted and tweaked in peculiar spots, occasionally tinny or harsh. An inline remote control and microphone add value to the CX 275s, but the remote lacks volume controls, which is a bit of a bummer. Overall, the CX 275s is a powerful pair with a lot to love,Pros - Powerful, distortion-free audio performance with deep, boosted lows. Inline remote control and microphone for mobile devices. Comfortable, secure, lightweight fit.Cons - Inline remote has no volume controls.

ReviewTitle: I got these earphones and a brilliant price of 1300 bucks
ReviewBody: I got these earphones and a brilliant price of 1300 bucks! It has stunning clarity for music and for calls. I loved the fact that there is an additional pouch to carry these earphones. Even other expensive brands wouldnt provide a pouch at this price point. I checked multiple websites and still got the best price on Amazon. At a sub 1500 price point, these are definitely a must buy! Excellent bass and treble balance. The add on connector sent with the earphones is a fantastic add on in case you are using older android phones where this connector is a must-have. Just buy this earphone without any second thoughts if it hits a 1300 or 1400 price point. Amazon as always, you rock in your delivery.

Skullcandy makes affordable quality products. I have had 5 different items during the course of last 3 years and not a single disappointment.Pros:-â€¢ 5-6 hours of battery with 'highest' setting of volume, maybe more with a lower setting.â€¢ Spare earbudsâ€¢ Comfortable fit. For those who think the band may cause uneasiness, trust me, you won't even feel the band on your neck, it is featherlight.Cons:-â€¢ NoneBrilliant Bluetooth headset, highly recommend prospective buyers to invest in this quality product.

ReviewTitle: The ones that i have are amazing, the charge lasts a over a day
ReviewBody: The ones that i have are amazing , the charge lasts a over a day , longer than my phone's battery , connects almost instantly , stays put on your neck no hassles of falling off due to the rubber clip in front , never felt it heavy . The rubber is just perfect on your ears they dont hurt at all.  yes you may have to clean them once in 2 to 3 days so they dont give you an ear infection (that s the case with any ear phone ) a device worth the buy , has lasted me over 5months now . i expect it to last longer .:)

ReviewTitle: Works well; Trouble paring more than one device at the same time
ReviewBody: Many time it is unable to pair with more than one device at the same time. I want it to pair with my laptop and my phone. Sometimes it pairs and sometimes it does not. But overall it is good and battery life is good as well.Charging takes time, should be improved.

ReviewTitle: I am changing my review over this.It stopped working within a year.
ReviewBody: the headphones worked for a year without a glitch, but almost a year later, the console became gummy and sticky, I used these headphones only while traveling in public transits(bus). The console cover got completely spoiled and came off the headphones totally leaving the inner circuit open, after that within a day or two headphones died completely. Now they are just a piece of dead garbage, doesn't even charge or get turned on.Skull candy provides 2 years warranty all across the world except India.WOW.... it's just a year of warranty u get in India and upon calling they told me that Skullcandy headphones cant be fixed in any other way and I have to buy a new one. This wasn't expected from Skullcandy, I am hugely disappointed with the product, my 3700 bucks are wasted. I would recommend not to purchase this garbage as it works only for a year.

I have using this product for 4 days now.Sound quality is as expected,No issue about it at all.Battery Back up is also good around 6 hrs, gets charge quickly.Call communication is also loud & clear no prob at all.Fits very well ..Only thing is bluetooth range it works fine in same room or if phone is in direct sight. If any obstacles are there in between then only it drops connectivity.

ReviewTitle: At this price tag its best. Mid bass is good
ReviewBody: Got delivery on time. Do not compare this earphone with wire earphone. As this is Bluetooth based wireless earphones it compresses the sound quality hence we don't get amazing sound quality as wired. I have compared this earphone with Sony SBH70 which is costlier then this but same result. So I will recommend this earphone at this cost the bass is good not amazing but mid range is amazing try listening song with 320kbps bit rate MP3 songs. Only disadvantage is you will not get the sound quality like wired one. Although it's best earphone at this price. Listen song just by tweaking equaliser you won't be disappoint.

ReviewTitle: Best Sounding wireless Earphones for this range
ReviewBody: I have been using this headphones for a week now and I have never seen or heard a much more beautiful elegant earphones at all.  The best in bass and crisp raspy sound. People say that the neck band is slightly discomforting..  But I'd say No..  I wore them seeing 2 good movies back to back and I did not feel discomforting at all. Makes u feel as if this is not there on your ears and neck at all.Pros1)Perfect fit on the ears2)Very light weight compared to other wireless earphones on market3)Good Bass4)Amazing design and the neck bands do come out and go in very easily5)Very very quick and easy pairing for my One plus phone. BTW it supports dual pairing.6)Call connection is good and it my voice is very clearly audible for the other person while on phone. Mic is good.Cons1)Battery life isn't more than 6 hours as I fully charged the earphone and watched 2 movies back to back which was around 6.5 hours and it beeped for low battery.2) The earphones without the neck bands may be a little and I mean slightly little issue as they tend to slide back off the neck.  If the beck bands are attached, it stays put.3) No one touch Siri or Google now which is the only thing I did not like as I am a great fan of those. While driving if u want to call someone then u have got to remove your phone and dial which is sometimes irritating as I feel.On the whole this  is a beautiful piece of device for 60$ or 3200 INR. Please go for it as it's perfect for good listening with good bass and very comfortable for long hours of gym and musicHope you like my reviews and thanks for reading them.

Got it in a deal for 1899/- and here are my thoughts.1. Connectivity and Range: Very Good. It powers on fast and pair easily & quickly, and I can even walk between rooms without any loss in signal or quality.2. Sound:  Decidedly average. It is definitely boosted, so if you do like punchy bass and are not particular about texture or accuracy, no problems. Sound better than almost anything that comes packaged with a smartphone. Distortion creeps in at 65%+ volume3. Usability:  They fit snugly, and isolate just enough so you can hear your music well but also know what's going on in traffic around you.4. Calls: Under normal circumstances these are fine. Person on the other side had some problem hearing me when I've used these while cycling.5. Battery: Good. I use them for about 2-3 hours a day and charge them every 3 days. They charge in a couple of hours and are good to go. Battery lasts for around 5-6hours on an average.Overall: Easy to recommend if you're only looking for an upgrade to generic earbuds and want to try wireless. Battery life and connectivity are great so no issues there. However, if you're primarily looking for a good listening experience, I'd say pass on this one.

ReviewTitle: Don't go through this mess. Might as well light your money on fire.
ReviewBody: Listening to your neighbours blasting bhajan sangeet is a better wireless music experience than buying jbl. I hope God forgives these souls for making these earphones, because I know I can't. I am a JBL fan. I use a lot of their products like their sound bar, flip 4, wired earphones etc. They're all of wonderful quality and excellent durability. I saw that these didn't have a good rating on amazon, but still bought them because I trusted jbl. But as it turns out these are equivalent to cattle - excrement. I've never been so disappointed in something before. I absolutely hated the sound. I thought I'll give it another day and voila, the earphones have the craftsmenship of a toddler's craft from pottery class. The earpiece was coming apart, not to mention how difficult it was to keep them in my ear without falling. Don't buy it. You sure deserve better. I'd wish this whole experience only on the worst of my enemies.

ReviewTitle: A good enough buy for the price
ReviewBody: Software :The sound quality is nice, not crystal clear but good enough.The bass is very good. Perfect for EDM lovers.The connection range does not extend to another room.Rarely, there are problems with connecting to the device, not a red flag.Hardware:The device does not sit perfectly on your shoulder, it slides about, may be a red flag for certain users.The magnets that are supposed to hold the earbuds together are very weak and keep disconnecting.Noise cancellation works very well.Battery life is somewhat poor. The output of a fully charged device is less than 6 hours.Can't say much about durability now as it hasn't been long since I bought it. All I can say is, JBL has much better durability than Skullcandy.Overall:For its price, it's a catch.

Got them for about 2K, and have been using more than a couple of hours each day. Definitely worth the price.Sound quality: Average, but that means it doesn't do anything terribly. The bass isn't as punchy, and the treble could have been more defined. But, there is no noise, so the mids come through clearly (perfect for my choice of music). The volume is a bit lower than wired earphones, but there is no distortion at peak volumes, not that it should be used at those. You could get wired earphones with similar sound quality at abt 1K, so that makes sense, considering that they need to charge for bluetooth hardware.Battery life: Now, this could be done better. Either the should have given a larger battery, or had better battery management software. It doesn't turn off if it is paired, but not used for an extended period. So, you have to make sure that you switch it off manually. Lasts about 4-5 hrs on less than 50% volume.Durability: uses flat wires, and the built "seems" sturdy. Definitely better than my Sennheiser earphones.Other features: call quality is decent enough. Mic is not that great, need to be pulled closer for decent performance unless you want to speak up a bit. Buttons are decent, and work without fail. There is a bright LED on the control capsule, lets people know you can't hear them. Wire is a bit too long, could've been a couple of inches shorter each side, but the balance is good. Fit snugly in your ear, doesn't fall out. The earphones bundle up nicely, and take practically no space in your pocket.Overall, given the price, meets my expectations. Wasn't expecting them to match something worth 6K or more, but doesn't disappoint for the money I spent.

ReviewTitle: Not a durable product at all !!
ReviewBody: I purchased this product a month ago & before to complete its first month, one of the ear-bud stopped working .This was never expected from a brand like JBL !! Amazon return policy gets over within 10 days but then to search for JBL Service Center is a very painful task.JBL has a single Service Center in each city, so very bad 'After-Sale-Service' !! (if you are not lucky)Even after visiting the Service Center, you are asked to submit your defective product & to come-back after 15days to get your product !! (Till the time its time of frustration !!)If possible, please dont go for this Product. Sound quality is also not attractive...

ReviewTitle: After a year and half of thrashing it finally gave in
ReviewBody: Writing this review after a year and a half of really rough usage.I have been taking this headphone where ever I go it survived falling down on roads and in the rain ,I have to tell I am really impressed with the build quality and the price was really reasonable.After one year of thrashing and rough usage it finally gave in this week even the charge lasted much longer than usual and charging time was also really less.I would recommend this to anyone due to its superb build quality and long lasting battery.Coming to the sound quality I would give it 5 stars as being a frequent traveler I have no issues and the Bluetooth connectivity is also fast.I wear this earphones inside my helmet and am still able to hear  anything without any problem around traffic.

Product has zero bass ( BASS and TREBBLE are not balanced) , TOTAL WASTAGE OF MONEY .if u are long  time music listner, and like to listen bass , DONT GO FOR IT ,.......Don't know why it's marketed by the name PURE BASS ....it should be sold by name PURE TREBBLE as  BASS is missing from the product.

Have true pure bass, but only when it is inserted deeply into the ear channel. When the ear plugs are simply kept into the ears, you could hear only treble and no bass.Overall a good product.

ReviewTitle: Bluetooth connectivity poor - overall an above average experience
ReviewBody: Automatically disconnects after a certain period of time without any kind of notification. The connection also goes off when a phone call comes in and you choose the option to talk without the earphones - after the call ends, you would have to reset the bluetooth connectivity all over again.The sound quality and noise cancellation features are good enough with respect to the price of these earphones.

Didn't even last for a year.Durability is least.The right earpiece broke (Thanks to my nephew)If taken care with proper care might last for 2 years(max).We have two in our house.One had to be replaced again due to non functioning of one side.The other one is the one I'm reviewing.Sound quality was top notch though.Battery backup is decent with 4-5 hours of continuous playback.Charging to 100% takes more than an hour.Verdict- Don't buy this crap, spend some more rupees and get a better quality one.

ReviewTitle: Worst Life Product From A Brand Like JBL
ReviewBody: Got this in Jan 19 and worked very well with excellent excellent quality as expected from JBL. What was not expected is the product lasted just 50 days and all of sudden mic stopped working, - volume button turned hard and could not press. When I tried pressing it the cover flicked off.Contact JBl customer and they were polite enought to guide me to service centre. Reached service centre and surprisingly I was told that there was a physical damage. I told that top cover just flicked when I pressed the volume button little hard. The service centre guy and JBL call centre guys told that it is a use and throw product and under one year it is just replacable. Sincerely with damaged they cannot process the warranty. I think ,  Even a small damage, they will reject the warranty claim. I think they expect the consumer to keep the product intact for a year. Not buying and recommending this anymore

ReviewTitle: I bot JBL T110BT 2 months back on 22nd Feb ...
ReviewBody: I bot JBL T110BT 2 months back on 22nd Feb 2018 and after 15 days, to my surprise the left side of the ear phone stopped working. was unable to exchange as according to the return policy the closing date was 5th March. DAMN EXPENSIVE :((

ReviewTitle: the voice on calls was pathetic as the reciever was hearing loud noises other than ...
ReviewBody: Was a big fan of JBL untill i received this product. The sound was not upto the mark. the voice on calls was pathetic as the reciever was hearing loud noises other than my voice. Bass was not proper. better to go with a wired earphone instead of buying this. It was looking so big on neck and was not manageable for runs and workout. Immidiately ordered return and amazon took lot many days to first return it and i am stil waiting for my money to be processed so that i can order a different earphone.

Third class product and can't contact JBL customer support through call or email. Headphones battery doesn't hould charging even after charging overnight and it drains in few minutes feels like Amazon is good at  selling cheap products nor JBL or Amazon is ready to take responsibility.

ReviewTitle: Don't waste your money on this piece of crap.
ReviewBody: This is my personal experience with this product.I own JBL stuff at home.. but this device just doesn't belong to that category! Weird. Really disappointed by the quality. The audio quality doesn't sound like a genuine JBL make.. with very cheap BASE and slightly HIGH TREBLE.. it's not a pleasant product to enjoy music with.. sounds like the Chinese made â‚¹150 earphones.. i bought this product once and had it returned.. but then there was no available option for a refund. The Customer service executive asked me to have the product replaced and check the product quality as the one i recieved might have been damaged for some reason. I agreed and after 3 days i received my product today and it's a NEW one but now i realise the product quality.. the problems i mentioned earlier still persist. There was no defects in the earlier one either.. And now i return it again and i see a refund option.. but then initially i used my VISA card to pay.. and now the refund would only credit into my Amazon Pay Balance and not my bank account. Amazon wants me to spend that money on buying products from Amazon itself n wouldn't refund it to me. Anyways that shouldn't matter me as im a frequent user of the Amazon Pay Balance. But who knows it might be a matter of fact to other people using Amazon out there. That's again pretty disappointing. Totally unsatisfied with the seller and the product.PS : I tried this product on the One Plus 5T, Samsung Galaxy S9+ and also on an iPhone 7+ and it was all the same.

there is a serious pairing issues with this headset. I was facing this issue for quite some time that while talking on call headset pairing breaks with my phone. i have tried it with other phone as well thinking it could be a device specific intermittent issue but story remained unchanged. additionally, i have testify it another friend of mine who recently purchase it and he stamped on this issue.would want to return it but my returning duration is lapsed. I am stuck with this faulty piece. :(have bought on a higher price than Portronics (becuase of brand image, JBL) but regretting now. :( :(

Awesome product. Battery backup is about 5 1/2 - 6 hours when i am using it continuously. Have been using it for more than 3 months. No issues faced. If your usage is within 5 - 6 hours at a time my suggestion go for it. Voice is clear when speaking, lightweight. Bass & sound quality is great but does depend on the app you are using in your phone to listen to music. I have tried with JIO music, Amazon music, jet player etc. Most of the players gave excellent output. I guggest try with different players or equalizer settings to get the perfect audio. The wires are tapered in shape hence can sustain a little bit of stress. 3 different size of earbuds are available with this product and selecting the correct size does not allow the buds to fall off (Tried it when running on a treadmill). All in all awesome product at this price.

Terrible Bass. This product does not justify the name given to it. I bought a Portronics Por-766 Conch 204 along with this set, just as a spare, cost me some 400 or something which has a better output than the JBL. I wouldn't reccommend this product if you want to listen to music.I cannot believe I fell for this brand and model name like this. I wish I hadn't bought the product.

ReviewTitle: Good sound quality but low on durability
ReviewBody: Pros: Crisp sound. Good bass. Good volume range.Cons: Works smoothly for the first month or two. Post that you realise that there are connection issues due to minor obstructions like fabric or even if device is obstructed by a body part (neck or hand), so the sound falters. Initially I could keep my mobile in my trouser pocket and listen to the music, but later on there was so much of connection stability issues, I had to hold it in my hand or keep it in direct, unobstructed range from the device. You can also see a drastic dip in the range between device and the headset over a period of time.Eventually, it pretty much becomes as good as a regular earphone, because of the way and distance you have to place your device from you phone or laptop.I had to replace it after 4 months (it was in it warranty period). The condition of the replaced product is the same now. Might get it changed again, I think, because its still in the warranty period. The good part about their service centre is that they replace it without asking questions, as long as you have the valid invoice with you.

ReviewTitle: Perfect companion to your ears and soul.
ReviewBody: After a long research to get my BT Headset in the price rage of Rs.2000, I finally landed with this one. I'm happy about this choice. I explored Ant, Tagg and other brands but the JBL brand value and its wider service network given confidence. Surely it's simple yet powerful headphone. very elegant design, no non-sense outfit. Perfect for several hours of music. It is having magnetic lock, which is not mentioned in the product page. In the pack, it has different sized three pairs of ear-bud caps, the subtle Orange in the ear-buds presents its beauty very presently. As far as sound concern, it is JBL. I already own speaker and over-head phone from JBL, which are performing for several years consistently. This also proves its quality. Good bass and clarity, even in minimum to maximum volumes. If you have high resolution audio files, it is perfect companion. The mic placement is not friendly and no carrying pouch is given so, I deduct one star for it.
They sell calling it pure bass.. extra bass earphone..Which it is surely not.. even JBL Equalizer app isn't recognizing it.

ReviewTitle: Not so Good product as its Name
ReviewBody: Calling....is Good but...for music there is no Bass system...it run like a normal headset after paying 2k plus....So needs to improove music quality... besides all fine...

ReviewTitle: Charging issue after a month use.
ReviewBody: It stopped after a month of working.Cahrging stopped. Warrenty is not supported from the amazon you have to rush to the JBL service center to get replace. Sound qualityis good but not great. Just a ordinary headphones at the such cost.

ReviewTitle: so obviously the sound quality and bass are awesome and upto the expectations
ReviewBody: I don't need to talk about the quality of the product...duh!,  it's JBL, so obviously the sound quality and bass are awesome and upto the expectations. The only problem (s) I faced were that it's wire is way too long for a Bluetooth device. Sometimes it creates problems. On top of that, the right side earpiece stopped working after just 1 month of use. Since it was under warranty I ordered for an exchange.

ReviewTitle: ... people have started selling fake products but I deeply disappointed by the product
ReviewBody: I don't know if Amazon people have started selling fake products but I  deeply disappointed by the product. It abruptly stopped working after 15 days of purchase & I can't even return it. I have ended up wasting my 2000 bucks

ReviewTitle: its good as looks contains magnetic attraction bass + clear audio ...
ReviewBody: its good as looks contains magnetic attraction bass + clear audio with nice battery life bt price is too high for quality

ReviewTitle: JBL T110 BT- Worth the money?
ReviewBody: Battery life is Good but expected a little more from JBL in terms of sound quality.Yes, Tested this with youtube, inbuilt music player of phone and play music app. You will get the real bass only when you tweek the settings to bass boost @ 100 in equiliser of play music app.Rest the build quality is good and product is 100% genuine...Fitting in ear is good and both the earbuds are magnetic enables you to carry them around your neck easily.To wrap up; If you need a decent pair of earphones with not boomy heavy bass but optimum bass then go for it !
It disconnect every time u listen to a song.Bought same product second time still faceing the same issue.

Ok batter back up, decent sound and bass. Volume feels low sometimes during call specially when you are in traffic area. Otherwise good option for those who want decent bluetooth handset.... Recommended if you have low budgetEdited on 07.06.2018Start disconnecting automatically, need to reconnect it manually again and againGetting switched off automatically and when try to get it on again nothing will happen, respond like battery drain out completely although it was not. Then after half an hour or so it start responding after pressing on/off buttonBattery backup also not good as it was earlier
Donâ€™t buy poor voice quality while on call and they wonâ€™t even return the product you can only replace it ... do not buy !!!

Pure bass tag given is not applicable for the product. Jbl disappoints the bass feature with this product. Treble is soo high that you wish to lower your volume and just enjoy the music in background but the feel is lost. i don't recommend this product to anyone.

Worst product to use with iPhone. Heats up in ears. I took a replacement, however, even the replaced product is not up to satisfaction. Further, Amazon was not ready for refund. I use it only to listen to music. If we have to talk to someone, this is not a good option especially if you have an iPhone. There is no noise reduction in spite of paying so much money. Wouldnâ€™t recommend.

ReviewTitle: Sound is good,bass is normal not have deep base.
ReviewBody: Sound quality is very clear and good but base is normal.battery life is good and noise cancellation is exillent.

ReviewTitle: Sound quality is POOR. No bass
ReviewBody: Sound quality is POOR. No bass, not much treble. If you have used better headphones in the past, it will sound like you are listening music in speech mode. Its flat.  [No beats:( ]. Sony MDR-EX150AP which is like the cheapest Sony headphone with mic is light years ahead w.r.t to sound quality.Buy this only if you are desperate for a Bluetooth headphone.

ReviewTitle: Noise cancellation is good. And Thanks Amazon for timely delivery
ReviewBody: The Earphones are decent to listen music. To Receive calls, the voice echoes. More so,the length of the chord could have been a little shorter as it's length is a little bigger for a Bluetooth earpiece. Rest, Noise cancellation is good. And Thanks Amazon for timely delivery :).

ReviewTitle: Just Bass not Extra Bass or Pure Bass
ReviewBody: It comes with medium ear buds default.Not good for bass lovers, although JBL says it's pure bass. Not pure or extra bass. When pressed with hands tightly, we can feel some bass.Sony Extra bass lovers not buy this product.Treble is bit more even the equilizer is adjusted.Jbl : Hear the truth, their tag line.That is true for every jbl product.I think I'll love this headset gradually.Some adjustments are made. First replace medium ear bud with small size bud. It places tightly in the ear. Thus feel more bass

ReviewTitle: Please dont buy this waste of money and its against the advertised
ReviewBody: Not sure why JBL have  pure bass and bass is zero.Please dont buy this waste of money and its against the advertised.

ReviewTitle: Just Fine for the price range.
ReviewBody: In â‚¹2000 price range its a fair purchase. The sound quality though is not that up to mark, at least not what I expect from JBL. Its not Pure Bass as it says its just a lot of Treble and I hate it. Overall its OK just turn on the EQ and change it to Bass Booster but it will lower the volume a little and you can hear the outside world clearly. The design is neat and very attractive but the placement of the mic is not a suitable position. The Bluetooth sometimes disconnects when multitasking. I faced this problem while I was playing PUBG and suddenly someone called when I picked up the phone it disconnected that is very annoying every time as you have to go through the Bluetooth settings to reconnect. Rest its all right. Afterall we should not forget we are getting all that in â‚¹2000. So thatâ€™s quite okay. Its not a compromise its a good purchase.

ReviewTitle: call quality is really bad and wire is too long
ReviewBody: Not worth of its cost.. good for music lovers but call quality is really very bad .other person can't hear you untill you put that microphone almost inside your mouth . and the wire is extra large which is not convenient..and some times it disconnects automatically ..if you receive a call while watching a video you have to reconnect it after the call to hear the sound of that video again..
Noise cancellation is not working properly

ReviewTitle: Power button stopped working within 4 months of careful usage
ReviewBody: I bought this product in January, 2018 and within 4 months its power button stopped working. I was able to switch it on, and then i was not able to switch it off.I used it with soo much care and all its hardware is working fine. But i don't know what goes wrong when i switch it off, while it easily get switched on using same button.I am not able to carry it anywhere. So no use of its portability.While my friend bought same product from a retail shop and his is working just fine.Amazon doesn't sells original products.I have now got a very negative insight for Amazon and will never recommend anyone to shop. And will even try my best to stop if anyone buys from it.

ReviewTitle: Quality of product is good for this range of money
ReviewBody: Quality of product is good for this range of money. Sound quality is good, bass is ok as it's mention as pure bass. Little bit unsatisfied due to not having waterproof, carrying case and deep bass as compare to Boat rockerz 250 waterproof for this range of cost. Over all product is more than average. And received in good condition.

Got a defective product on 23rd april.. suddenly stopped working while listening song even after charging for 3-4 hrs.. thought it dint charged .. or may be it mst hav disconnected while charging ..Same i kpt for charging .. neither the white light was glowing while charging .. nor the blue light .. Today . 3rd may i put dwn d request to retrn it ..Lets C ..  how Amazon gonna behave ..Feel likeni lost my money
Visakhapatnam no service centre on JBL products
I've received an old product in which one wasn't even working. Also, there was no charging cable.

ReviewTitle: Very bad. Not worth for the sound and product quality.
ReviewBody: Left earpiece stopped working in few hours of use.No bass at all. No effect. Just flat sound.Very annoying blue light for indications.Wires are very delicate, I felt it will tear so soon.Product quality and reliability is very bad.
Amazing sound quality but apple earpods weigh in with a better sound clarity! Anyways great quality
Company name only product performance is poor
As usual delivery was very quick. It's just couple of days since the product arrived. So far it's good to use. No abnormalities observed. Sound is fair for talking and listening songs.

The sound is Good.Bass is good but treble is also high.I got it replaced the earlier product didn't have bass to it but the replaced headphone is good.Call quality is on average side but I didn't buy it for that so no issue for me.If anyone get headphone with more treble than base just replace it.

ReviewTitle: Incoming and outgoing call quality is very poor, noisy and not audible
ReviewBody: Incoming and outgoing call quality is very poor, noisy and not audible.It didnot serve the purpose of making calls.Receiver of the call complains that the audio is not clear.

I was using this for 2months  sound quality is good not that great but at this price tag ok .if jbl makes more bass of this that would be great.in terms build quality is superb. I recommend this for work outs who travel a lot.

ReviewTitle: Great for the price, and value for money.
ReviewBody: Product is amazing.For the price and for the sound quality both. I loved it.Just that in call voice was different in different devices.Nd it seems durable too..3.5 if i could give that stars out of 5
After 2months suddenly headphone is not working .. couldn't able to find issue.. its not switching ON. But when I put it on charge i can able to see the white led glowing

ReviewTitle: Battery life is 10 min and charging problem

ReviewTitle: Guys, JBL is always the best.
ReviewBody: This is the best bluetooth headphone I've found in this price range and this has come new in the market recently. Specially the magnet ting in the ear pieces are awesome, it's the most helpful thing.In the box it says "Pure bass", bass is not that high but audio clarity with effects is really good. While listening to some tracks I feel that treble is little high but that I've solved by using equalizer on my phone. It took me about 1 hr 40 mins to charge and goes on full day well.The wire which is at the rear (neck area) should've been a little longer and front ones a little short because it's sometimes difficult to find the buttons for changing songs or picking up the call.But overall according to my experience JBL is always the best. No matter what product you buy from them their music quality is always the best.

ReviewTitle: Read the full review then buy....!!
ReviewBody: this device here received a tons of negativity on Amazon and other sites but just a quick note that when we shift from wired to wireless the sound quality really affects so if we have to compare we should do it with other wireless earphones not the wired one .The sound quality is nice, not crystal clear but good enough.The bass is good. Perfect for EDM lovers Electronic dance music.The connection range is amazing .It's really easy to connect to new deviceson the physical overview, it has got a really big neckband which is kind of annoying most of the times and it has 3 buttons - one to play and pause  music or receive call or end and the other two to change the music as well as to change volume, depending the time u press those keyswhen we talk about the looks of the device it looks good if you are wearing a shirt or a t-shirt with a collar so u can hide the neck ban in the collar if not then it's uncomfortable and also looks awkward at the same timeat a price point of 2000rs and jbl branding it is a fair pricetime for the big deal the pros and conspros;Noise cancellation works very well.Battery life is good. The output of a fully charged device is around 6-8 hours  depending on the volumebuild quality is amazingCons:The device does not sit perfectly on your shoulder, it slides aboutThe magnets that are supposed to hold the earbuds together are very weak and keep disconnecting.bass is not much as jbl devices are known for high bassThis is a great device but the wireless earphones lacks in either sound/battery/looks/comfort and this one lacks in comfort

ReviewTitle: Pick these up blindly if you get them below 2k
ReviewBody: Not sure why there are so many negative reviews, these earphones are great. Have been using them daily for about 3 hours a day for the last 4 months and they are close to perfect.I use Audio Technica m50x for listening to music for the most part. Bought these JBL Bluetooth ones for use where the m50x is too bully to carry.Pros:Charge lasts about 5 hours.Lightweight.Produces very clear sound.Bluetooth range is quite high, at least 15 metres in my experience.Cons:Slightly more expensive than I'd have liked, I paid 2250...Microphone is placed near your shoulder so taking calls can be a little irritating. People keep telling me I sound like I'm far away.

ReviewTitle: Decent Earphones. Good Battery. Poor Call Quality
ReviewBody: This is a decent earphone considering the sound quality, brand value and cost. Don't expect thumping bass response from its 8.6 mm driver, the sound is not flat or full though. Give it some time to burn in the speaker to get the real sound of it. The call quality is horrible with this , you just can't roam around the rooms and talk, also the mic position is problematic. The build quality is average and is made of plastic, the wire is tangle free and of good quality. My first set have one of its speaker casing fall out of place, so have to order a replacement. Overall, it's a decent earphone.

ReviewTitle: well its a jbl, but then...

ReviewTitle: Finally a worthy product from JBL
ReviewBody: Amazing release from JBL!  Worth every rupee! This product is very light and charges quickly! Easy to use! This comes with mic! Sound effect is very good. The only drawback is u can't find a dedicated button for Google assistant. There r 3 buttons. Hold center button -- On/Off. Press once - pause/play music - left click - volume down, right click - volume up,  hold left button - previous track, hold right button - play next track. Calls can be received with click on center button.
